imdb.plot outline: In this hilarious series, wild and rare animals from the jungles and deserts of African and beyond are given comedic voice overs - bringing human comedy to the chaotic animal world. Taking advantage of fascinating nature footage from the BBC, this series is a humorous and surprisingly informative glimpse into the social lives of animals.
imdb.title: Nature's Soap Operas
plot: In this hilarious series, wild and rare animals from the jungles and deserts of African and beyond are given comedic voice overs - bringing human comedy to the chaotic animal world.
